column1: # TRANSACTION CATEGORY TEST FIXTURE - CSV FORMAT
# CSV test fixture for transaction category reference data supporting comprehensive
# testing scenarios for Spring Batch processing
# This fixture supports:
# - Transaction category code validation and format testing
# - Category description mapping and length validation
# - Active/inactive status handling and business rule testing
# - Foreign key constraint validation with transaction data
# - Spring Batch reference table processing validation
# - PostgreSQL database migration and data loading testing
# Based on: app/data/ASCII/trancatg.txt - Original COBOL reference data
#           TransactionCategory.java - JPA entity structure and validation rules
#           V6__create_reference_tables.sql - Database schema constraints
# Format: transaction_category
# Constraints:
# - transaction_category: 4-character numeric string (required
# - category_description: 1-60 character string (required
# - active_status: boolean (true/false
# Author: Blitzy agent
# Created: CSV test fixture supporting transaction category validation testing
# Version: 1.0
transaction_category
